definition: residence/(coll.) to stay in at home/to hang around at home
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
lit. to live on a boat/to drift from place to place (idiom)

definition: die-hard otaku (sb who hardly ever emerges from their home, where they play games, watch movies etc)
to handle official business/to work (esp. in an office)
to live alone/to live a solitary existence
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
